DOC.brief_title: The Effect Left Uterine Displacement Parturient Cardiovascular System
DOC.detailed_description: At operating room , patient monitor use non invasive blood , ECG , pulse oximeter electrical cardiometry . Baseline read take supine position repeat put patient leave lateral position angle 15 30 degree . Then two IV line insert 500cc crystalloid administer . Subarachnoid block perform sit position complete aseptic condition use 25 g spinal needle . Subarachnoid block achieve inject 10 mg hyperbaric bupivacaine plus 25 ug fentanyl . The block consider successful adequate block reach T4 dermatome . After successful block hemodynamic variable record position ( 0,15 , 30 degree leave uterine tilt ) . A minimum number 61 patient calculate study power 80 % alpha error 0.05 . SPSS Chicago 18 software use data analysis . Categorical data present frequency , continuous variable present mean Â± standard deviation analyze use way analysis variance ( ANOVA ) post-hoc pairwise comparison use bonferroni test . A P value 0.05 consider statistically significant .
DOC.criteria: full term , singleton , American society anesthesiologist ( ASA ) I II pregnant woman schedule cs BMI > 35 Kg/m2 polyhydramnios history impaired cardiac contractility valvular heart disease cardiac arrhythmia hypertensive pregnancy disorder fetal abnormality
